verify.title: Verification Process
verify.description: Our team reviews and verifies reports to ensure accuracy and priority

resolve.title: Issue Resolution
resolve.description: Track progress as local authorities work to resolve the reported issues

howToReport.question: How do I submit a report?
howToReport.answer: You can submit a report by clicking the 'New Report' button and filling out the form with details about the issue, location, and optional photos.

timeToResolve.question: How long does it take to resolve an issue?
timeToResolve.answer: Resolution times vary depending on the type and complexity of the issue. Most reports receive an initial response within 24-48 hours.

anonymous.question: Can I report anonymously?
anonymous.answer: Yes, you can choose to submit reports anonymously. However, providing contact information helps us follow up if we need more information.

tracking.question: How can I track my report's progress?
tracking.answer: Each report has a unique ID and status that you can track through your account or using the public tracking feature.

hero.description: Report local issues anonymously, track their progress, and help make your community better.
